column2: "I was waiting for you, <%me>."
"Hah! How was I? I sounded just like Xion, right?"
"Well, I am an exact copy of her, so it's only natural I sound just like her."
"But enough of this formal talk. Lets be more friendly with each other! I will also be relying on you a lot."
"Oh, right, the thing. The reason why I called you here, the thing I could only tell you in person."
"About that girl... Matoi."
"To be honest, I have no clue who or what she is. There is no data about her anywhere at all."
"She has that much power... and yet records of her existence haven't been made. This is strange."
"Whether it be the ARKS database or Xion's records, she doesn't exist. Almost as if she was intentionally kept hidden."
"If it was Loser that erased her, I might have accepted this... but even he did not know about her."
"Which leaves only one person who is capable of this..."
"That's right, Xion. She erased her data, all of it."
"That isn't the only thing that was erased too. Data from about ten years ago, all of it, was perfectly erased."
"Not just the data, but all the members of ARKS don't remember anything. Their memories have been erased."
"Salvages, pursuits, investigations are impossible. A perfect blank, its really strange."
"Ten years ago... in the memories that everyone lost, there has to be something there. But it's impossible to follow lost memories."
"So we should go there directly, and investigate what happened."
"<%me>, you should be able to do that."
"I'm not just saying all this out of curiosity either."
"Xion is gone, and Loser has been destroyed. From now on, ARKS will undergo big changes."
"In other words, the control Loser had and all of Xion's calculations, I'll have to do all of it."
"For the sake of the new ARKS, to preserve and manage it, I will need to learn as many things as possible."
"Regardless of how bad the circumstances are..."
"That said, it is true that I am curious. I do want to learn about the history before I was born, and also about myself."
"Therefore... What we do from now on, I leave to you. Even among all of the things you don't understand, I'm sure good things will still come of it"
"So if you are willing to help, despite this, please consult with me any time. I will always be waiting for you here."
